author: Will Goodbody
title: Banks work through 28,000 mortgage break applications
description: 28,000 mortgage payment break applications have been processed or are currently being worked through by the banks in the last week since the initiative got under way.
content:
28,000 mortgage payment break applications have been processed or are currently being worked through by the banks in the last week since the initiative got under way. 
It follows a plan put in place by the main lenders to help people cope with financial diff… [+2095 chars]
